    • Method Detail

      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove​(int boardIndex,
                        int row,
                        int col)
        Makes a move on the specified board at the given row and column.
        Parameters:
        boardIndex - The index of the board (0 for player, 1 for opponent).
        row - The row index of the move.
        col - The column index of the move.
        Returns:
        True if a boat was hit, false otherwise.

      • placeBoatManually

        public boolean placeBoatManually​(int row,
                                 int col,
                                 int boatSize,
                                 java.lang.String orientation)
        Places a boat manually on the player's grid at the specified position and orientation.
        Parameters:
        row - The row index to place the boat.
        col - The column index to place the boat.
        boatSize - The size of the boat.
        orientation - The orientation of the boat ("horizontal" or "vertical").
        Returns:
        True if the boat placement is valid, false otherwise.
